english_example_sentence: If the weather had been good, we would have reached the old village.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы погода была хорошей, мы бы добрались до старой деревни.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer hava güzel olsaydı, eski köye ulaşacaktık.
